sourcesContent:
import e from "cors"; import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import './RegStyles.css' function RegServicePage() { const [service, setService] = useState({ detalle : "", valor : 0, estado : "Inactivo" }); const requestInit = { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(service) } fetch("http://localhost:3001/add-service", requestInit) .then(res =>res.json()) .then(res => console.log(res)) const handleSubmit = () => { if (service.detalle =='' || service.valor == 0 || service.estado =='') { alert ('Todos los campos deben estar rellenados') return } } const handleChange = e =>{ setService({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } useEffect(() => { setService(); },) return (

GESTIÓN DE SERVICIOS

Registro de Servicios
) } export default RegServicePage;
